name: Death Dive Dreamworld
description:
It's a 2d platformer where the levels are divided into layers and dying on a lower layer takes you back up to a higher layer. 

I thought it was a good idea, but once I got the mechanics put together and needed to make levels, I couldn't come up with many good ideas. I did learn a few things putting this together, so it's not a total waste of time, but I won't work on this any further.
